references.paper_title: 4d-fy: Text-to-4d generation using hybrid score distillation sampling
references.reason: This paper is a direct competitor of the proposed method, proposing a similar task of generating 4D content from textual prompts.

references.paper_title: Stable video diffusion: Scaling latent video diffusion models to large datasets
references.reason: This is the foundation for the image-to-video diffusion models which are essential to the proposed method's core approach.

references.paper_title: Objaverse: A universe of annotated 3d objects
references.reason: This paper provides the dataset used for evaluating the proposed method, which is crucial for assessing performance and comparing it with baselines.

references.paper_title: Google scanned objects: A high-quality dataset of 3d scanned household items
references.reason: This paper is another important source for the 3D object dataset used for evaluation in the paper.

references.paper_title: Imagen video: High definition video generation with diffusion models
references.reason: This paper is another significant foundation for image-to-video diffusion models, which is essential for understanding the method's functionality.
